scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && elm make Main.elm --optimize --output=dist/app.js && elm make Example.elm --optimize --output=dist/example.html
scripts.debug: mkdir -p build && cp index.html build/ && elm-live Main.elm --dir=build -- --debug --output=build/app.js
scripts.live: mkdir -p build && cp index.html build/ && elm-live Main.elm --dir=build -- --output=build/app.js
scripts.publish-to-gh-pages: mkdir -p dist && npm run build && cp index.html dist/ && gh-pages --dist dist/ && echo 'deployed to https://kinto.github.io/elm-kinto/'
